result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thao P. Yang

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on November 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 1:24 p.m. 
INCLUDES: 20CF1238, 20CF1311, 22CF1081. 
Defendant appears via Zoom from MCJ, pro se;
Date and time set for a review hearing.

COURT notes Deft has not been qualifies for SPD as of today.
Defendant was under the impression that a previously appointed SPD would be representing him.
COURT notes that Atty is not available anymore.
COURT instructs Deft to speak with SPD.
COURT finds good cause to toll time limits until next hearing.

DATES:
Remove PH;
RH: 11/11/22 @ 1:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 1:27 p.m.

Review hearing on November 4, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on November 9, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 7, 2022 at 09:10 am.

Case Called: 2:15 pm
INCLUDES 22CF1081, 20CF1311, 20CF1238.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence in person.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, pro se.
VRCW.  
COURT QUASHES WARRANTS.
Reading Waived.  
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

BOND: 
$5,000 Cash Bond to cover all files.

CONDITIONS: 
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

PH 11/09 @ 9:10 am
RH 11/04 @ 1:00 pm
PTC with JA 12/07 @ 9:10 am
